pageContent: Introduction: Erectile dysfunction (ED) and urinary incontinence (UI) following radical prostatectomy (RP) adversely impact patients psycho-emotional status reducing the quality of life and treatment satisfaction.

metaData.source:
Androgen deprivation therapy's impact on the mood of prostate cancer patients as perceived by patients and the partners of patients
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26332203/
